title: Locavore Bistro
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bistro cafe with focus on local ingredients. Dishes that are or can be made vegan include a tofu breakfast scramble, hummus veggie wrap, quinoa salad, vegan burger, rosemary polenta with garden ragout. Sometimes has vegan muffins. Almond milk option for coffee.
